title: Attendence in constitution 1st sem
content: Does it matter cuz these people have only uploaded the 3 slots which I failed to attend

comments.body: Dosent matter much but now it's 2 credits apparently? Still shouldn't matter a lot. Just make sure to keep it atleast above 40-50
Don't skip most.  But yes the credits are lower so it doesn't matter compared to any other subject.
